docs.snippet: The hearing came at a time when the N.C.A.A. was facing increased scrutiny on a number of fronts....
docs.lead_paragraph: The hearing came at a time when the N.C.A.A. was facing increased scrutiny on a number of fronts.
docs.abstract: Democratic Sen Jay Rockefeller of West Virginia, during Senate Commerce hearing on NCAA's treatment of college athletes, voices his anger at the state of college sports; echoes critics who have bemoaned its professionalization, and perception that increasing revenue is not being fairly shared with athletes; hearing comes at time when NCAA is facing increased scrutiny on number of fronts.

headline.main: Senate Committee Presses N.C.A.A., Signaling Interest in Direction of College Sports
headline.print_headline: Senate Committee Presses N.C.A.A., Signaling Interest in Direction of College Sports

docs.snippet: The company, which signed a 13-year, £300-plus million contract in 2002, said that it would end its role as the team’s primary equipment manufacturer....
docs.lead_paragraph: The company, which signed a 13-year, £300-plus million contract in 2002, said that it would end its role as the team’s primary equipment manufacturer.
docs.abstract: Nike announces that it will end its role as Manchester United soccer club's primary equipment manufacturer; 13-year relationship with English Premier League's best-known club has helped spur Nike's sales of soccer equipment.

headline.main: Nike and Manchester United Set to End Equipment Partnership
headline.print_headline: Nike and Manchester United Set to End Equipment Partnership
